Class MABGetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • unidue.ub.statistics.alephConnector.MABGetter

  • public class MABGetter
extends java.lang.Object
    Retrieves the MAB-data from the Aleph database.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Frank Lützenkirchen, Eike Spielberg

      • getMAB

        public org.jdom2.Element getMAB(Manifestation document)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        retrieves the bibliographic information as MAB-fields for a given document from the Aleph database
        Parameters:
        document - the document the bibliographics information are retrieved for
        Returns:
        Element org.jdom2.element holding the bibliographic information in MAB format
